en_us: Launch an aquatic animal using a crossbow
Create a 40-block long tripwire circuit using a crossbow

Shoot more than just arrows! Crossbow Cartridges allows your crossbow to fire a variety of projectiles; Shoot Pufferfish, Tripwires, Torches, and many more. Synergizes nicely with the Ziprails Module for easy Ziprail construction.
Shooting a crossbow with certain items in the offhand will launch that item instead of the arrow.
When held in the offhand, these items can be shot from crossbows:
Torch is placed on the block the arrow hits.\nIf the torch cannot be placed here, it is dropped.

Stand in a tripwire hook and look in one of the
cardinal directions to create a tripwire line.

A tripwire hook can be placed automatically at the end.
The water bucket will be kept
